Option: msg:"FILE-IDENTIFY JPG file attachment detected"; flow:to_server,established; content:".jif",fast_pattern,nocase; content:"Content-Disposition: attachment|3B|"; content:"filename=",nocase; pcre:"/filename=[^\n]*\x2ejif/i"; flowbits:set,file.jpeg; flowbits:noalert; metadata:policy balanced-ips alert,policy max-detect-ips alert,policy security-ips alert,ruleset community; service:smtp; classtype:misc-activity; sid:21737; rev:13;
